network.title: Network Subdomain
network.description: A pre-configured Twingate network subdomain (eg. autoco from autoco.twingate.com). This avoids users needing to enter your Twingate network address on first run.

startAtLogin.title: Start At Login
startAtLogin.description: Starts the Twingate Client upon user login

PresentedDataPrivacy.title: Suppress Data Privacy Screen
PresentedDataPrivacy.description: Suppresses the first run Data Privacy screen

PresentedEducation.title: Suppress Education Screens
PresentedEducation.description: Suppresses the first run Education screens
